guide.introduction: This project is good if you are just starting with Arduino. it blinks an LED in the same pattern as the Morse code pattern for SOS
guide.introduction_rendered:
This project is good if you are just starting with Arduino. it blinks an LED in the same pattern as the Morse code pattern for SOS

Relevant parts
  • Arduinio
  • LED

lines.text: You only need an arduino and a led
lines.text_raw: You only need an arduino and a led

lines.text: The code is pretty long so I just pasted it below
lines.text_raw: The code is pretty long so I just pasted it below

lines.text: void setup () { pinMode(13, OUTPUT); }  void loop() { digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(100); digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(100) ; digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(100) ; digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(100) ; digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(100); digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(1000) ; digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(1000) ; digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(1000) ; digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(1000) ; digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(1000) ; digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(1000) ;

lines.text: digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(1000) ; digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(100); digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(100) ; digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(100) ; digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(100) ; digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(100) ; digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(1000) ; }
lines.text_raw: digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(1000) ; digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(100); digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(100) ; digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(100) ; digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(100) ; digitalWrite(13, HIGH) ; delay(100) ; digitalWrite(13, LOW) ; delay(1000) ; }

lines.text: now insert a LED into digital pin 13 and ground; upload the code and you are ready to go.
